TopicTitle: 64bit version reporting back wrong version number

Articles.Content:
Mainly playing with the 64bit version I realized after some mods reported "Unsupported Version, please use 24.2" that the 32bit executable reports as 24.2.559 but the 64bit executable reports as 24.0.549

Patcher tells me everything is up to date...

Is there any way to spoof the correct version in the 64bit executable or make it otherwise report, correctly, back as 24.2.x?

There'd be no point; your perception of the issue is incorrect. The patcher is unable to update the x64 version at the present time. If you want to update it, you need to manually download the x64 build from the Store.

Your x64 version is actually out of date; the patcher simply doesn't recognise it.
